懩懩懩

懩字的基本解释

懩
yǎng
心里想逞能：“屏发布而累息，徒心烦而技懩。”
心忧不定。

懩字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yǎng］
［《集韻》以兩切，上養，以。］
(1)跃跃欲试。
(2)心情不定。参见“懩懩”。

懩字的康熙字典解释

【卯集上】【心字部】　懩； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页407第17
【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?以兩切，音養。心所欲也。【潘岳·射雉賦】徒心煩而技懩。【註】有藝欲達曰技懩。　又與癢通。【杜甫·八哀詩】薈蕞何技癢。

懩字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
懩字的起名意思

暂无。

Faint
Basic explanation of words
Faint
yǎng
I want to do something in my heart: "The screen release is exhausting, but it's only annoying and awkward."
Anxious.
Faint
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yǎng］
["Jiyun" is cut in two, the upper support, with. ]
(1) I am eager to try.
(2) Feeling uncertain. See "luo".
Faint
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Ji 1] [Heart Word Department] 　懩; Kangxi strokes: 19; Page number: page 407 17
[Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Positive Rhyme]? Use two cuts to maintain sound. Whatever you want. 【Pan Yue·Shooting Pheasant Fu】It's only upset and skillful. [Note] There is a desire for art to reach a skill.　It is connected with itch again. 【Du Fu·Eight Sad Poems】How can it be itch?
